interleave.py.keyStrokeInfo:
def fun_interleave(s1,s2):
    s=""
    if(len(s1)>len(s2)):
        for i in range(len(s2)):
            s+=s1[i]+s2[i]
        s+=s1[len(s2):]
    else:
	    for i in range(len(s1)):
		    s+=s1[i]+s2[i]
	    s+=s2[len(s1):]
    return s
